modName: Sadistic Magician Mash-Up Outfit for UNP
summary: The Sadistic Magician Outfit for UNP Body Types is a wandering Mage Themed Outfit, a bit sexy but not too skimpy, it also looks like it could be the Outfit of a feisty Thief or Assassin with an affinity for Magic... kinda dark Magic. ^-^ First Published Mod, Please Enjoy
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://fs1.directupload.net/images/150105/mlmxsewg.png[/img][youtube]YzbGOT2CMvg[/youtube]

[color=#dbb0a7]Thanks Hodilton[/color]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoEjvAplB6GaVJjCAwx3fJA][img]https://gp6.googleusercontent.com/-9UQiX4aQrn0/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAC0/B0EaQJ3vXm4/s48-c-k-no/photo.jpg[/img]Hodilton´s Youtube Channel[img]https://gp6.googleusercontent.com/-9UQiX4aQrn0/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAAC0/B0EaQJ3vXm4/s48-c-k-no/photo.jpg[/img]

[youtube]yjoVGTqCal0[/youtube][/url][/center]

Sadistic Magician Mashup v1.0 
----------
[font=Courier New][color=#d5a6bd][size=5]Description[/size][/color][/font]
----------
[color=#000000]
[/color][center][color=#000000]For Manual Installation Simply Drop the Data Folder into your Skyrim Folder[/color]

Adds a [color=#ea9999]feminine[/color]/[color=#e06666]wench[/color]/[color=#e06666]thief[/color]/[color=#f4cccc]assassin[/color] mage themed outfit. The outfit can be forged, improved, and enchanted.
The outfit comes in 3 parts. You can craft them in leather Section.
There are Cuirass, Boots and Gloves/Gauntlets.[color=#dd7e6b][size=3] Currently working [/size][/color]on different Textures.[color=#f4cccc] Should work on CBBE or Vanilla Body too[/color][/center]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#cccccc][i][size=2]"In case you were wondering, the outfit names
are more named for the characters
the outfits were made for than how the outfits look. The Character is being a
sadistic magician and all. The outfit itself is sort of wandering mage themed."
[/size]-Halo
[/i][/color][/font]
[color=#000000][size=3]Looking forward to see Screenshots <3 
[/size][/color][color=#980000][size=3]
[b][i]Mods Used[/i][/b]
[/size][/color]
[color=#dbb0a7]DIMONIZED UNP female body [/color][size=3][color=#dbb0a7]by Dimon99[/color]

[color=#cccccc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP Body[/url][/color]

[/size][color=#ea9999]SG Female Textures Renewal [/color][size=3][color=#ea9999]by Hello Santa  (The Eyebrows too)[/color]

[/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Textures by Hello Santa <3[/url][/size]


[color=#dbb0a7][size=4]BLEAK ENB - UNBLEAK ENB [/size][/color][size=3][color=#dbb0a7]by Akira (Used the Bleak version - love it)[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24828/?]Bleak ENB[/url]

[/size][color=#f4cccc]Enhanced Character Edit [/color][size=3][color=#f4cccc]by the ECE Team[/color]

[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]ECE[/url]

[/size]....And a bunch of other Mods, ask me if you want to know them. <3
